JA.H1: 英語の自己学習者、海外への旅行者＆任者をサポートするコミュニティー
JA.MISSION1: 日本語 Help you connect with other expats and immigrants in Japan
JA.MISSION2: 日本語 Help you get information for living and travelling in Japan
JA.MISSION3: 日本語 Help you find resources for studying Japanese
JA.HERO2: 日本語 Find connections. Share resources. Learn together.
JA.HOW_TO_HELP: コミュニティーをすべて探検しよう
JA.HELP1_DESC: 日本語 Join groups to practice writing and reading Japanese. Ask and answer any questions related to the Japanese language.
JA.HELP2_DESC: 日本語 Get resources and connect with others wherever you are in the world. Ask and answer questions related to travelling and living in an area.
JA.HELP3_TITLE: スタディーバディー掲示板
JA.HELP3_DESC: 日本語 Become a study buddy and find like-minded students to study Japanese. Do a cultural and language exchange in the comfort of your home. Volunteer to teach Japanese people learn English.
JA.HELP4_DESC: 日本語 Going back home? Moving to Japan? Buy, sell or offer your used items to future expats and immigrants.
JA.HELP5_TITLE: 自己英語の学習サポート
JA.HELP5_DESC: 日本語 Learn pronunciation, listening, speaking, and vocabulary by just reading! We show, and support how to supplement and fast-forward your English learning for both kids and adults. Free trial available.
JA.HERO3_TOP: 日本語　Whether you're a traveller, a student, an expat, immigrant or citizen,
JA.HERO3_BOTTOM: 日本語we are here to support you.

EN.H1: Community for learning Japanese and living in Japan
EN.MISSION1: Help you connect with other expats and immigrants in Japan
EN.MISSION2: Help you get information for living and travelling in Japan
EN.MISSION3: Help you find resources for studying Japanese
EN.HERO2: Find connections. Share resources. Learn together.
EN.HOW_TO_HELP: Explore all 4 areas of support within our community
EN.HELP1_DESC: Join groups to practice writing and reading Japanese. Ask and answer any questions related to the Japanese language. Get resources on studying Japanese.
EN.HELP2_DESC: Get resources travelling to and living in Japan. Ask and answer questions about a region. Find others living in your area you are travelling to or living in.
EN.HELP3_DESC: Become a study buddy and find like-minded students to study Japanese. Do a cultural and language exchange in the comfort of your home. Volunteer to teach Japanese people learn English.
EN.HELP4_DESC: Going back home? Moving to Japan? Buy, sell or offer your used items to future expats and immigrants.
EN.HELP5_DESC: Learn pronunciation, listening, speaking, and vocabulary by just reading! We show, and support how to supplement and fast-forward your English learning for both kids and adults.
EN.HERO3_TOP: Whether you're a traveller, a student, an expat, immigrant or citizen,
EN.HERO3_BOTTOM: we are here to support you.
